summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department; authorizing an easement agreement with Raymond Gourley and June M. Gourley, his wife, for access road and utility purposes over and across a portion of the City's Duwamish Transmission Line Right of Way in the vicinity of South Bangor Street and 55th Avenue South, Seattle, King County, Washington, upon receipt of a form of release of easement from said parties previously granted by the City under the authority of Ordinance 96648.
